answers.answer: I would say around 38 or 39 wks that way there is a greater chance that your babies lungs are fully developed, you may also want to discuss it with your dr they can provide you with the most best info for you specifically
My midwife gave me the okay at 36 weeks but I have pregnancy diabetes but I think they really prefer you wait til like 37-38 weeks.

question: When should I try to get labor going along? I was thinking doing things starting at 37 weeks. Walking alot, boucing on pregnancy ball etc.  When do you think?
title: when should I try to go into labor?
